references.paper_title: A survey on deep learning: Algorithms, techniques, and applications
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of deep learning, which is foundational to many concepts discussed in the AutoSurvey paper.
This highly influential paper introduces deep learning, a crucial concept underlying the technology that AutoSurvey leverages.
This comprehensive textbook on deep learning serves as an essential resource for understanding the foundations of the models used by AutoSurvey.
This paper provides a detailed technical report on GPT-4, a key large language model used in the AutoSurvey methodology.
This paper introduces a significant advance in computer vision that, while not directly used by AutoSurvey, highlights the rapid advancements in related AI fields.
